Package com.rb.biz.guice

Class RBThreadLocalClock

java.lang.Object
com.rb.biz.guice.RBThreadLocalClock
All Implemented Interfaces:
RBClock
public class RBThreadLocalClock
extends java.lang.Object
implements RBClock
A RBClock that's particularly useful when running multiple backtests in parallel.
